item.title: Mass Migration and Liberalism’s Fall
item.description: A decade on, Angela Merkel’s immigration disaster has created a right-wing surge.

item.title: Judge Apologizes to Conservative Justices in Case Over N.I.H. Cuts
item.description: The display of contrition came after Justices Gorsuch and Kavanaugh issued a stern warning directing judges to heed their orders in August.

item.title: Google Must Share Search Data With Rivals, Judge Rules in Antitrust Case

item.title: L.A. Ruling Complicates Trump’s Threats to Send Troops to More Cities
item.description: As Democratic cities brace for possible military deployments, Democratic governors see in a lower-court ruling the potential for legal protections.

item.title: Maduro Says War With Venezuela Would Stain Trump’s Hands with Blood
